+-----------------------------------------+
| MP2 I2C Walle Firmware Release Notes - CEZANNE
+-----------------------------------------+
+----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
| Version 2.1.2.0
+----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
|   * Date (dd/mm/yy)
|           24/12/20
|
|   * Features enabled
|       - Support Walle sensor power measurement
|       - PM logging MP2 FW support for OchreDAP
|       - enable PAC1934 SMBus timeout
|
|   Jira ID : [PLAT-74339] [IMP] Walle-lite sensors enable SMBus timeout
|
|   * Limitation
|
